metadata.name: FLUID PARTICLE DESIGN ONE  #1/100
metadata.description:
I have been dreaming of being able to paint with data and flowing dynamic particles for over 3 years, ever since I saw MediaArt pioneer Refik Anadol's brush. 
Every purchase supports me to continue my journey and master flowing dynamic designs that are accessible to everyone. 
With each NFT, you get exclusive access to a token gated website with exclusive content + a letter with private thoughts I would never divulge. 
You will find various long-play-motion-designs created by me over time if you hold this NFT.


I would like to take this opportunity to thank everyone who made it possible for me to be here. 
In the first place, thanks to all who have supported my work on social media or even bought ART from me.  

Special thanks to the Houdini Teachers / Educators / Tutorial Makers:  
Rakib Sharka, Gizmo, Doxia Studio, Entegma, MitzuTA and many more.

- RandomLikeU aka Patrick Scislowski
